statements.query: MATCH (n:GitLabGroup{id: $GITLAB_GROUP_ID})<-[r:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})  WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:GitLabGroup{id: $GITLAB_GROUP_ID})<-[r:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
